news.content:
ðŸ’¡ ThreeFold Reading & Consensus Reminder


We'd highly recommend the community to check out our latest blogs â€“ Building the Future We Want to Live in â€“ A Four Step Journey & Welcome to the Internet of Internets â€“ to discover how we are positioning and scaling ThreeFold.


For a deeper look, dive into ThreeFold Litepaper v17.


Related: This week, the team will be at Consensus by CoinDesk, where ThreeFold is a sponsor (Booth 310)! We'll also be hosting a gathering with the Austin community centered on the co-creation of a sovereign regional Internet by and for the people of Austin. If you'll be in town, get in touch!
news.excerpt: Sharing some recent important ThreeFold materials and a reminder about Consensus.
